forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 24 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. West southwest wind 13 to 24 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun graces Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, its rays break through, illuminating the city with a gentle warmth, yet the brisk west-southwest wind whispers of the ocean’s embrace. The day’s high temperature hovers near a comfortable 60 degrees, though expect a slight coolness as the afternoon unfolds, nudging the mercury down to around 58. Despite these inviting temperatures, the city remains kissed by coastal influences; pockets of fog cling to the edges, teasing the Golden Gate without fully obscuring it, giving a soft-focus feel to the iconic landscape. 

As night approaches, the sky will shift to a dreamy expanse of partly cloudy hues, settling at a low around 50. With winds picking up to around 24 mph, one might want to bundle in layers—perhaps a lightweight jacket atop a cozy sweater would suffice. Consider an evening stroll along the waterfront, where the cool breeze mingles with the murmurs of the bay, or stop by a local café for warm comfort, as the city begins to settle into its evening rhythm, a tapestry of life woven into the brisk air.
